#Exercise 1

```{r}
vec_a <- c(1, 6)

vec_b <-c(2, 4)

vec_1 <- vec_a + vec_b

vec_2 <- vec_b - vec_a

vec_3 <- 4 * vec_a

vec_4 <- vec_a %*% vec_b
```
